com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.builtin

Interface ComonadEnv<E,A,W extends com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<?,W>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the environment type
    A - the value type
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.functor.Functor<A,W>, java.util.Map.Entry<E,A>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.adt.product.Product2<E,A>

    public interface ComonadEnv<E,A,W extends com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<?,W>>
extends com.jnape.palatable.lambda.comonad.Comonad<A,W>, com.jnape.palatable.lambda.adt.product.Product2<E,A>
    An interface for an Env Comonad, which provides some additional context through ask(). In the simplest case, for Env, this is a Product2 with the additional semantics that Product2._1() is the environment, and Product2._2() the value extracted from the Comonad.
